alert.note: Alert for Henry (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 2:43PM EDT until June 14 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Henry County in north central Georgia... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 243 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Flippen, or near McDonough, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... McDonough, Stockbridge, Hampton, Lovejoy, Locust Grove, Blacksville, Luella, Ola, Flippen and Eagles Landing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
